Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Update OpenXML MS documentation" (#1442) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Describe the bug**
After this commit a number of APIs were removed:
https://github.com/dotnet/Open-XML-SDK/commit/4260711d6234f078b24c26d26eb17205532901d5
For example
`GetPartsCountOfType` was removed but the documentation doesn't indicated deprectated or removed in the applies to section.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/documentformat.openxml.packaging.openxmlpartcontainer.getpartscountoftype?view=openxml-2.8.1

infact the documentation hasn't been updated since 2.8.1 and these apis lived on through 2.20.0
https://github.com/dotnet/Open-XML-SDK/compare/v2.20.0...v3.0.0-beta1.patch

This is particularly unpleasant because the example code in the documentation is also incorrect: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/office/open-xml/how-to-insert-a-comment-into-a-word-processing-document

It does appear the documentation is hosted on github. Can you please update the documentation? While I muddled through, porting my app to the latest sdk, It would be good for future users of the sdk to have a single source of truth.

Events.RelatedBody:
Bumps [Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk](https://github.com/microsoft/vstest) from 17.7.2 to 17.8.0.
Release notes

Sourced from Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk's releases.

v17.8.0

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/microsoft/vstest/compare/v17.7.2...v17.8.0

v17.8.0-release-23468-02

What's Changed

  • Upgrade Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 by @​mthalman in #4681

Full Changelog: https://github.com/microsoft/vstest/compare/v17.8.0-preview-23424-02...v17.8.0-release-23468-02

v17.8.0-preview-23424-02

What's Changed

  • Add possibility to send telemetry events by data collectors by @​jakubch1 in microsoft/vstest#4622
  • Fix timing issue in parallel execution by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4629
  • Document default value for diag trace level by @​riQQ in microsoft/vstest#4640
  • Remove process suspend by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4586
  • Make async VSTestConsoleWrapper apis obsolete by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4648
  • Mitigate the usage of JsonConvert.DefaultSettings in user code by @​Applesauce314 in microsoft/vstest#4581
  • Set console encoding to UTF8 by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4649
  • Fix executable bitness for testhost.x86 by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4652
  • Change license packages that use .NET Library license to MIT by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4658
  • Fix cannot find System.Text.Json by @​nohwnd in microsoft/vstest#4668

New Contributors

  • @​riQQ made their first contribution in microsoft/vstest#4640
  • @​Applesauce314 made their first contribution in microsoft/vstest#4581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/microsoft/vstest/compare/v17.8.0-preview-23371-04...v17.8.0-preview-23424-02

v17.8.0-preview-23371-04

Issues Fixed

  • Take System dlls from testhost folder #4610
  • Simplify naming in ExecutionTests
  • Fix XmlException when writing Html log with certain test names #4576

Full Changelog: here

Drops

  • Microsoft.TestPlatform.ObjectModel : v17.8.0-preview-23371-04
Commits
  • cf7d549 [rel/17.8] Update dependencies from devdiv/DevDiv/vs-code-coverage (#4692)
  • 9fbb6e9 Merge branch 'main' into rel/17.8
  • bb99e3e Upgrade Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 (#4681)
  • e527e41 [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build-reference-packages (#4677)
  • f49f8c0 Update dependencies from https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/vs-code-cov...
  • 44d3923 Release branding 17.8.0
  • de95035 Update dependencies from https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/vs-code-cov...
  • c2d75c9 Fix SB ref assembly issue for System.ComponentModel.Composition (#4675)
  • 7c7e680 Update dependencies from https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/vs-code-cov...
  • d0f7444 Update dependencies from https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/vs-code-cov...
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
